summary: An email from an FBI agent requesting assistance to provide security and monitoring for Ghislaine Maxwell and her defense team during their review of evidence at the 500 Pearl Street courthouse from April 13-15, 2021. It details the logistical arrangements, including the need for FBI agents to escort and monitor Maxwell.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant whose defense team is scheduled to review evidence at the courthouse; she will be produced by the Marshals each morning and monitored by FBI agents throughout the day.

events.title: Maxwell Defense Evidence Review
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell and her defense team begin reviewing evidence at the 500 Pearl Street courthouse, with FBI agents providing security and monitoring.

locations: 500 Pearl Street courthouse, New York, NY
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's defense evidence review was scheduled for April 13-15, 2021, at the 500 Pearl Street courthouse.
FBI agents were requested to assist with security, specifically to monitor Maxwell, escort her from the Marshal cellblock, and accompany her to the bathroom.
Three proffer rooms were reserved: one for evidence review, one for private defense meetings, and one as a break area for agents and AUSAs.
The email indicates the ongoing legal proceedings and security protocols for Maxwell during her pre-trial evidence review.
